thread.section_title: Keep&Share Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keep&Share | keepandshare.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: Brenda

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
text: Useful and reliable, but just too complicated. Simpler would be much better, in my view. The latest features remain unclear, as I could not follow the videos. Too fast. And I still have not figured out how to delete an old to do list! I am no techie guru, but I am pretty comfortable online. Lots on here seems confusing and overdone. Maybe just not intended for personal use?
